ERROR TIPS

### Power Connection Issues
- Ensure all electrical entities are properly connected through a continuous network of power poles
- When placing power poles, verify there is no obstruction in the intended placement location

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones in a location
- When placing entities that require specific orientations, ensure the target position is clear

### Resource Shortage Issues
- Keep mining drills fueled to maintain continuous resource production
- Ensure proper fuel supply (coal) for all burner entities
- Monitor input material levels for assembling machines to prevent production stoppages

### Crafting Errors
- Items that require smelting cannot be directly crafted - use appropriate furnace setup instead
- Verify recipe requirements before attempting to craft items

### Inventory Management
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting placement or construction
- Monitor fuel levels in burner entities to prevent work stoppage
